name: complainingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows you think something is wrong or not satisfactory: "You always walk too fast for me," she said complainingly. The little dog whined complainingly as we took him into the vet's. See
complain
More examplesFewer examples"You took your time, didn't you?" Geoff said complainingly.Bismarck once remarked rather complainingly that his son had not advanced as rapidly as he had hoped.This probably helped me tolerate discomfort less complainingly later on in life.
